website_summaries.verdict: This line of soft cat treats is more focused on an irresistible taste than anything, and cats can’t get enough of this squishy and fishy treat.
cons: “Animal liver flavor” is the first ingredient

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it...not sure what else to say, they will stab me with their claws if i don't give them some!
customer_reviews.author: Tbay007

customer_reviews.title: picky cat loves these !
customer_reviews.text: Tinkerbell is a fairly picky eater, but loves these. I cannot, but cannot find them in an actual store, so being able to get them get them brought right to me, after 2 minute online search/order is AWESOME !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Having them on hand makes it so easy to give him pills -- I just cut the ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat adores these! Having them on hand makes it so easy to give him pills -- I just cut the pill into pieces, mold these soft treats around the pieces of pill, and he devours every one I put in front of him. Now I don't have to wrestle him to the ground and shove a pill down his throat! Thank you, Whisker Lickins, for reducing the stress in my life! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My poor cat has bad teeth so finding soft food is easier for him. Problem is, there isn't a lot out there. But he very much enjoyed this treat
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ferg

customer_reviews.title: My cat is obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: My cat begs for these all the time! She knows where they are kept so she will sit there and meow until she gets one!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat would devour these faster than anything, however, he had a bad reaction to them so he might have had an allergy we didn't know about. Gave them to our neighborhood cat lady.
customer_reviews.author: Amm0622

customer_reviews.title: Cats don't like them
customer_reviews.text: They smell horrible and our cats don't like them. I ended up feeding them to the various wild animals showing up at our back door. Even they didn't eat them very well, but they did when they got hungry enough.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Just What Kitty Ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I should say my cat loves these "soft & delicious" tid bits! I just don't understand why they are priced higher than like flavors from Purina.
customer_reviews.author: B. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My fussy cat (all are fussy) loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My fussy cat (all are fussy) loves these treats! I give him one each time I clip his nails. He behaves now for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: TechnoSleuth

customer_reviews.title: Broken bag!
customer_reviews.text: I received the cat treat package today. All 3 of them have broken seals, 2 seam cut, 1 looks like ripped. My kittylord LOVES this cat treat. He wanted them so bad but I am not going to give him something from a broken bag for God knows how long! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Azice

customer_reviews.title: Order
customer_reviews.text: Order received, but it was 3 packs of dog treats. Cat not happy,
customer_reviews.author: Carol Benson

customer_reviews.title: Fan favorite
customer_reviews.text: The only treat my 6 year old cat will eat!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa avraham

product_meta.title: Purina Whisker Lickin's Soft & Delicious Salmon Cat Treats - 2.5 oz. Pouch (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: There’s a reason we call it Whisker Lickin’s. These treats are so delicious, your cat will savor every morsel! Share a moment with your cat that’s so special, she won’t want it to end! In crunchy and soft varieties – and four scrumptious flavors.
feature_bullets: Three (3) 2.5-Ounce Pouch of Whisker Lickin's Soft & Delicious Salmon Flavor Cat Treats
Cat treats that bring you and your cat close.
In three fun shapes and a soft texture cats love
Think of them as purr starters
